reporting_cycle: The Secretary-General reports by 16 February 2010 and 1 April 2010
summary:
* Challenges in protecting civilians
* Assessment of protection mechanisms
* Implementation of the Policy Paper on MONUC's support to FARDC
* Deployment and use of additional capabilities
* Progress in security sector reform

42. Commends troop- and police-contributing countries and donors, and calls on Member States to pledge and contribute required capabilities.
43. Requests the Secretary-General to update MONUC's concept of operation and rules of engagement to align with this resolution and report to the Security Council and troop-contributing countries; 
44. Requests the Secretary-General, through his Special Representative, to continue coordinating UN system activities in the Democratic Republic of the Congo; 
45. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
